description.zh-cn: 中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一。事件后遭通缉并流亡海外，先后在法国、美国求学和居住。现为网络“六四档案”、“孙文学校”创办人。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests in China. He became a wanted fugitive after the event and went into exile, studying and residing in France and the United States. He is the founder of the 'June 4th Archive' website and the 'Sun Yat-sen School' online.

description.zh-cn: 中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一，封从德前妻。
description.en: A student leader in the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, and the ex-wife of Feng Congde.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的学生示威运动，以政府武力清场告终。
description.en: A student-led demonstration in Beijing, China in 1989, which ended with a military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university located in Beijing, China.

zh-cn: 巴黎索邦高等研究应用学院

description.zh-cn: 法国巴黎的顶尖研究与高等教育机构。
description.en: A leading research and higher education institution in Paris, France.

nodes.id: 北京高校学生自治联合会

zh-cn: 北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 于1989年学运期间由北京多所高校学生组成的独立学生组织。
description.en: An independent student organization formed by students from various Beijing universities during the 1989 student movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市人民政府下属的公安机关。
description.en: The public security organ under the Beijing Municipal People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 荷兰汉学家，专注于中国道教研究。
description.en: A Dutch sinologist specializing in the study of Taoism in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国1989年六四事件学生运动领袖之一，后流亡美国。
description.en: One of the student leaders of the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests in China, who later went into exile in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 由封从德于2001年创建的网站，旨在收录与六四事件相关的资料。
description.en: A website founded by Feng Congde in 2001, dedicated to archiving materials related to the Tiananmen Square protests of 1989.

description.zh-cn: 由封从德于2011年创办的网络学校。
description.en: An online school founded by Feng Congde in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 一个在八九民运期间成立、后在海外复校的民主教育项目。
description.en: A democratic education project founded during the 1989 student movement and later re-established overseas.

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府入境事务处

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府负责出入境管制的部门。
description.en: The department of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government responsible for immigration control.

description.zh-cn: 华裔历史学家、汉学家，以中国思想史研究见长。
description.en: A Chinese-American historian and sinologist known for his research on Chinese intellectual history.

nodes.id: 六四日记——广场上的共和国

zh-cn: 六四日记——广场上的共和国
en: June Fourth Diary: The Republic on the Square

description.zh-cn: 封从德撰写的回忆录，记录了他在1989年六四事件期间的经历与见闻。
description.en: A memoir written by Feng Congde, documenting his experiences and observations during the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 于1912年在中国大陆建立的共和制国家，现今治权范围主要为台湾、澎湖、金门、马祖。
description.en: A republic founded in mainland China in 1912, with its current jurisdiction mainly covering Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen, and Matsu.

description.zh-cn: 支持中华民国法统和政治理念的个人或团体。
description.en: Individuals or groups that support the legitimacy and political ideals of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的省级行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level administrative body for Beijing, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国西南地区的一个省份。
description.en: A province in Southwest China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于荷兰莱顿的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Leiden, Netherlands.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马萨诸塞州波士顿的私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private research university in Boston, Massachusetts, United States.

nodes.id: 北京大学团结学生会筹备委员会

zh-cn: 北京大学团结学生会筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 1989年学运期间北京大学的学生自治组织。
description.en: A student self-governing body at Peking University during the 1989 student movement.

description.zh-cn: 1989年学运期间在天安门广场进行绝食抗议的学生组织。
description.en: A student group that conducted a hunger strike in Tiananmen Square during the 1989 student movement.

nodes.id: 保卫天安门广场总指挥部

zh-cn: 保卫天安门广场总指挥部

description.zh-cn: 1989年学运后期负责协调广场学生行动的指挥机构。
description.en: The command center responsible for coordinating student actions in Tiananmen Square during the later stages of the 1989 student movement.

description.zh-cn: 封从德与柴玲于1988年结婚，1990年离婚。
description.en: Feng Congde and Chai Ling were married in 1988 and divorced in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 1982年入读北京大学，后被保送至该校遥感技术应用研究所。
description.en: Enrolled in Peking University in 1982 and was later admitted to its Institute of Remote Sensing and GIS Application.

description.zh-cn: 流亡法国后进入高等研究应用学院宗教历史系学习，先后获得硕士及博士学位。
description.en: After going into exile in France, he studied at the Department of Religious History at the École pratique des hautes études, where he obtained Master's and PhD degrees.

description.zh-cn: 1997年在莱顿大学研究儒家学说。
description.en: Researched Confucianism at Leiden University in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 1989年5月获得波士顿大学五年博士学位奖学金，但因六四事件未能入学。
description.en: Received a five-year PhD scholarship from Boston University in May 1989, but was unable to enroll due to the Tiananmen Square protests.

relationships.target: 北京高校学生自治联合会
北京大学团结学生会筹备委员会
保卫天安门广场总指挥部

description.zh-cn: 作为学生领袖，担任北高联主席等多个领导职务，是运动的主要组织者和领导者之一。
description.en: As a student leader, he served as the chairman of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation and held several other leadership positions, making him one of the main organizers and leaders of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，封从德被北京市公安局通缉，在中国大陆逃亡十个月后流亡海外。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, Feng Congde was put on the wanted list by the Beijing Municipal Public Security Bureau, and he went into exile after being a fugitive in mainland China for ten months.

description.zh-cn: 将封从德列为21名高自联骨干之一，进行全国通缉。
description.en: Listed Feng Congde as one of the 21 core members of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation and issued a nationwide arrest warrant for him.

relationships.target: 北京高校学生自治联合会

description.zh-cn: 宣布解散高自联。
description.en: Announced the dissolution of the Beijing Students' Autonomous Federation.

description.zh-cn: 在高等研究应用学院宗教历史系师从施舟人教授。
description.en: Studied under Professor Kristofer Schipper at the Department of Religious History of the École pratique des hautes études.

description.zh-cn: 在专访中批评王丹是中共“推明星以毁民运”策略下的“明星领袖”之一，并指其在回忆录中篡改史实。
description.en: In an interview, he criticized Wang Dan as one of the 'star leaders' promoted by the CCP's strategy to 'destroy the pro-democracy movement by creating stars' and accused him of falsifying historical facts in his memoirs.

description.zh-cn: 作为八九民运学生领袖，遭中共当局通缉并流亡海外。其言论主张中共崩溃。
description.en: As a student leader of the 1989 democracy movement, he was wanted by the CCP authorities and went into exile. His statements advocate for the collapse of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 于2001年创建《六四档案》网站。
description.en: Founded the 'June 4th Archive' website in 2001.

position.en: Member of the preparatory group for school re-establishment

description.zh-cn: 拒绝封从德入境香港并将其原机遣返。
description.en: Denied Feng Congde entry into Hong Kong and deported him on the same plane.

relationships.target: 六四日记——广场上的共和国

description.zh-cn: 为该书作序并称赞其“惊心动魄，一字千金”。
description.en: Wrote the preface for the book and praised it as 'soul-stirring, with every word worth a thousand pieces of gold'.

description.zh-cn: 主张中国大陆在中共崩溃后回归中华民国。
description.en: Advocates for mainland China to return to the Republic of China after the collapse of the CCP.
